com.yworks.yfiles.view

Class EdgeSelectionIndicatorInstaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.view.EdgeDecorationInstaller
      • com.yworks.yfiles.view.EdgeSelectionIndicatorInstaller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICanvasObjectInstaller, IFocusIndicatorInstaller, IHighlightIndicatorInstaller, ISelectionIndicatorInstaller

    public class EdgeSelectionIndicatorInstaller
extends EdgeDecorationInstaller
    An implementation of the ICanvasObjectInstaller interface that can install the selection outline of an IEdge.

    This will install an ICanvasObject that will render the path and the bends of an edge using a pen for the path and a drawing for the bends.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ResourceKey BEND_TEMPLATE_KEY
      A ResourceKey that will be used to find the IVisualTemplate that will be used to draw the bends of the edge.
      static ResourceKey PEN_KEY
      A ResourceKey that will be used to find the Pen that will be used to draw the path of the edge.

    • Method Detail

      • getBendDrawing

        protected IVisualTemplate getBendDrawing(CanvasControl canvas,
                                         IEdge edge)
        Callback method that retrieves the drawing of the bend for the context.

        This implementation will use the BEND_TEMPLATE_KEY resource to find a IVisualTemplate instance. If null is yielded, a default drawing will be used.

        Specified by:
        getBendDrawing in class EdgeDecorationInstaller
        Parameters:
        canvas - The canvas for which the drawing shall be returned.
        edge - The edge for which the rendering will be used.
        Returns:
        The drawing instance to use for the rendering of the bends in the given context.

      • getDecoratorStyleClass

                                        IEdge edge)
        Description copied from class: EdgeDecorationInstaller

        Specified by:

      • getPen

        protected Pen getPen(CanvasControl canvas,
                     IEdge edge)
        Callback method that retrieves the pen for the context.

        This implementation will use the PEN_KEY resource to find a Pen instance. If null is yielded, a default pen will be used.

        Specified by:
        getPen in class EdgeDecorationInstaller
        Parameters:
        edge - The edge for which the rendering will be used.
        canvas - The canvas for which the pen shall be returned.
        Returns:
        The pen instance to use for the rendering of the edge in the given context.
